      public de.schildbach.pte.dto.NearbyLocationsResult queryNearbyLocations(Set<de.schildbach.pte.dto.LocationType> types, de.schildbach.pte.dto.Location location, int maxDistance, int maxLocations) throws IOException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: NetworkProvider
      Find locations near to given location. At least one of lat/lon pair or station id must be present in that location.
      Angegeben von:
      queryNearbyLocations in Schnittstelle NetworkProvider
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      queryNearbyLocations in Klasse AbstractEfaProvider
      Parameter:
      types - types of locations to find
      location - location to determine nearby stations
      maxDistance - maximum distance in meters, or 0
      maxLocations - maximum number of locations, or 0
      Gibt zurück:
      nearby stations
      Löst aus:
      IOException

    • queryDepartures

      public de.schildbach.pte.dto.QueryDeparturesResult queryDepartures(String stationId, @Nullable Date time, int maxDepartures, boolean equivs) throws IOException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: NetworkProvider
      Get departures at a given station, probably live
      Angegeben von:
      queryDepartures in Schnittstelle NetworkProvider
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      queryDepartures in Klasse AbstractEfaProvider
      Parameter:
      stationId - id of the station
      time - desired time for departing, or null for the provider default
      maxDepartures - maximum number of departures to get or 0
      equivs - also query equivalent stations?
      Gibt zurück:
      result object containing the departures
      Löst aus:
      IOException

    • queryTrips

      public de.schildbach.pte.dto.QueryTripsResult queryTrips(de.schildbach.pte.dto.Location from, @Nullable de.schildbach.pte.dto.Location via, de.schildbach.pte.dto.Location to, Date date, boolean dep, @Nullable de.schildbach.pte.dto.TripOptions options) throws IOException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: NetworkProvider
      Query trips, asking for any ambiguousnesses
      Angegeben von:
      queryTrips in Schnittstelle NetworkProvider
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      queryTrips in Klasse AbstractEfaProvider
      Parameter:
      from - location to route from, mandatory
      via - location to route via, may be null
      to - location to route to, mandatory
      date - desired date for departing, mandatory
      dep - date is departure date? true for departure, false for arrival
      options - additional trip options such as products, optimize, walkSpeed and accessibility, or null for the provider default
      Gibt zurück:
      result object that can contain alternatives to clear up ambiguousnesses, or contains possible trips
      Löst aus:
      IOException

      Query more trips (e.g. earlier or later)

      Setzt außer Kraft:
      queryMoreTrips in Klasse AbstractEfaProvider
      Parameter:
      contextObj - context to query more trips from
      later - true to get later trips, false to get earlier trips

      result object that contains possible trips
